name: Noises Off
description:
Submission for the 20 Second Game Jam 2022

You wanted to have some nice sleep, but your neighbours won't turn off the music, which will cause you to have a heart attack in 20 seconds.

Teach them some politeness.

CONTROLS

WASD -> Movement

Left Click -> Shoot

E -> Start

R -> Restart game

CREDITS

All the music and sounds were made by Claire Ellis

https://clairebun.itch.io/
